title: The game play way too weirdly now.
body:
Snowballing is too strong, you and your team fall behind in early game and then spend the next 30 min doing nothing but running into a solid wall, there is nothing you can do, they are 30 kills ahead and have taken twice as many turrets as you, they always win in team fights, ace you multiple time, get baron/dragon every time its up because you are too weak to contest it, then somehow you get an ace at 40 min and win instantly.

like wtf is that?

can't we have a prolonged battle where either side has to give it their all for 40 min, instead of one side just toying around with the other until they either win with such overwhelming force that the other team feels unmotivated to start a new game, or make 1 single mistake after being so far ahead and lose, even though the other team has made way more mistakes.

i just want not even all, but MOST games to feel fair, it should be much much much harder fro your team to get strong but once you do its pretty sure that you'll win.

replies.body: If you are ahead and don't win the game when you can, you deserve to lose

Not necessarily, Some team comps need to end early no matter what or wait for the enemy to make a HUGE mistake so they have a chance to do something else rather to defend.
While on the other hand some team comps can't do anything till late game because of stacking and when they get late game there is no stopping them.

There are comps which gets stronger as it gets closer to late game. Yes that is true but if you are (very) ahead you should be able to defeat the enemies in every teamfight and end the game after a few successful teamfights.
then don't let your team 1v5, 1v5, 1v5, 1b5 then leave you to 1v5... I can't carry if im 13/0 tf and team is all 2/12 + ;-;
